subject: Automobile Racing
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: The Australian Grand Prix that year was a title-deciding, final-race showdown that ended one of the most dramatic and controversial seasons ever, and the outcome continues to divide opnion today.
snippet: The Australian Grand Prix that year was a title-deciding, final-race showdown that ended one of the most dramatic and controversial seasons ever, and the outcome continues to divide opnion today.
